title: Wages as a determinant of supply

content.prompt: If the wage rate of workers producing a good decreases, then which of the following will most likely occur?

choices.label: The demand curve will shift to the right.
The supply of the good will increase.
The quantity supplied of the good will decrease.
Demand for the good will increase
Quantity demanded for the good will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
